title: Currency Risk Premia and (Many) Fundamentals Connected in the Long-Run
excerpt: This paper studies the macroeconomic foundations of currency risk premia using a unique annual dataset spanning nearly a century (1926-2023), finding that strategies based on cross-sectional predictability yield more robust returns.
citation: Rostamkhani, Vahid. (2025). "Currency Risk Premia and (Many) Fundamentals Connected in the Long-Run." SSRN Working Paper.

title: Recoverable Equity
excerpt: This paper demonstrates an inverse relation between a firm's equity recovery rate in bankruptcy and its risk-adjusted expected returns, a premium distinct from leverage and distress risk.
